ygData.subject: RE: PoF pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, no doubt.  Who wants a loud, opinionated bard anyway?  ... I will definitely hit 50 before the new year ;) ... Where there s a twink there s a
ygData.messageBody:
> Harmonic tells the zone: "Level 50 Bard looking for a Fear group - will play
> mana song in combat!!" <eg>

Yeah, no doubt. Who wants a loud, opinionated bard anyway?
<g>

> p.s. I thot maybe by new year's but now maybe by valentine's day for me.

I will definitely hit 50 before the new year ;)

> am taking a week off during the holidays so - maybe Harm will charm some
> LDC's for me to kill??? (ya I know they are too high to bard charm - maybe I
> can find a necro twink me <eg>)

Where there's a twink there's a way. ;p Where my memblur tactics
fail, anothers will succeed. <g>

Harmonic.
